Sass Director

For directing Sass directories

Just sort out your Sass project architecture in a Sass manifest file (i.e. main.scss) or use an example from the showcase. Then, in your terminal, within the same directory as (only your) manifest file, paste the output generated below. It will quickly build all of your directories and files. Easy peasy!

.scss .sass
Prefix files with "_"
Save file
